text: President Donald Trump caused controversy on Sunday when he shared a video on Twitter of himself physically attacking someone meant to represent CNN. The video shows Trump taking down and punching a man with the cable news channel ’ s logo superimposed over his face. Trump accompanied the video with a caption, simply saying, “ # FraudNewsNetwork ” and “ # FNN. ” Sunday ’ s tweet is just the latest in the president ’ s online crusade against CNN, MSNBC, and other media outlets. Trump has been feuding with “ Morning Joe ” hosts Joe Scarborough and Mika Brzezinski all week, referring to the pair as “ low I. Q. crazy, ” “ dumb as a rock, ” and “ psycho ” on multiple occasions.
